title: Current - rank charge passing through wires X Y Z

content.description: Three wires each have an electric current for some time interval, as follows.
content.question: Wire <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> has a current of <math alttext="8" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>8</mn></math> amps for <math alttext="4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn></math> seconds.Wire <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math> has a current of <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> amps for <math alttext="4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn></math> seconds.Wire <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></math> has a current of <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> amps for <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> second.Which of the following correctly ranks the amount of charge <math alttext="Q" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>Q</mi></math> that passes through a cross section of each wire during the respective time intervals?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, Q sub X equals Q sub Y, close parenthesis, which is greater than Q sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub></math>

<math alttext="Q sub X, is greater than Q sub Y, which is greater than Q sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, Q sub X equals Q sub Z, close parenthesis, which is greater than Q sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></math>

<math alttext="Q sub X, is greater than Q sub Z, which is greater than Q sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="Q sub X, is greater than Q sub Y, which is greater than Q sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Q</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>Q</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
